markdownRemark.excerpt: Disclaimer: I am not a cinephile. There are an embarrassing number of must-watch films that I have simply not. The visuals - extraordinary. Haunting.
markdownRemark.html:
Disclaimer: I am not a cinephile. There are an embarrassing number of must-watch films that I have simply not.

The visuals - extraordinary. Haunting.
